price: Sai Muka yi wahayi zuwa ga Mũsã cẽwa "Ka dõki tẽku da sandarka." Sai tẽku ta tsãge,* kõwane tsãgi ya kasance kamar falalen dũtse mai girma.
arabic: فَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضۡرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرۡقٖ كَٱلطَّوۡدِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
footnotes: * Teku ta tsãge hanya gõma sha biyu a kan adadin danginBanĩ Isrãĩla. Suka bi suka wuce, sa'ilin nan aka nutsar daFir'auna, shi da jama'arsa, a cikin hanyõyin ruwan,.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā ani iḍ'rib biʿaṣāka al-baḥra fa-infalaqa fakāna kullu fir'qin kal-ṭawdi al-ʿaẓīmi
